Package marlin.auber.components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AABB
    An axis-aligned bounding box.
    ActivePlayerCharacter
    A marker component for the active player character.
    ArrestBeam
    A component for Auber which tracks arrest beams.
    CellNPCAI
    Jailed NPC artificial intelligence.
    Health
    A component for Auber which tracks health.
    Infiltrator
    A component for an Entity which flags whether or not they are an infiltrator.
    InvisAbility  
    KeyboardMovement
    A component for entities that can be moved by WASD.
    KeypadTarget
    A location that the player can find a keypad.
    NPCAI
    NPC artificial intelligence.
    Position
    A component for a thing in-game that has a 2d position.
    Renderer
    An entity that should be rendered on screen.
    SpeedAbility  
    StaticRenderer
    An entity that should have a static texture rendered at its Position no matter what.
    StunAbility  
    TeleportTarget
    A location that the player can teleport from and to.
    ViewportTarget
    "Marker component" for the entity that should be the viewport target.
    Walking
    Stores the state of a walking character to use in conjunction with WalkingRenderer.
    WalkingRenderer
    An entity that should have a walking or idle animation rendered.
